item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Deep Learning Is Applied Topology (79 points | 44 comments)
2. The Lisp in the Cellar: Dependent Types That Live Upstairs [pdf] (32 points | 1 comment)
3. Show HN: 90s.dev - game maker that runs on the web (12 points | 6 comments)
4. The emoji problem (2022) (199 points | 23 comments)
5. Show HN: Astra – a new js2exe compiler (10 points | discuss)
6. Show HN: A Tiling Window Manager for Windows, Written in Janet (8 points | discuss)
7. A simple search engine from scratch (151 points | 17 comments)
8. llm-d, Kubernetes native distributed inference (44 points | 2 comments)
9. Making Video Games (Without an Engine) in 2025 (344 points | 143 comments)
10. Compiling OCaml to the TI-84 CE Calculator (40 points | 1 comment)
11. Show HN: Text to 3D simulation on a map (does history pretty well) (25 points | 24 comments)
12. DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage (559 points | 149 comments)
13. Have I Been Pwned 2.0 (724 points | 238 comments)
14. Show HN: JavaFactory – IntelliJ plugin to generate Java code (25 points | 6 comments)
15. Jules: An Asynchronous Coding Agent (431 points | 175 comments)
16. Finland announces migration of its rail network to international gauge (323 points | 300 comments)
17. Why Does the U.S. Always Run a Trade Deficit? (103 points | 181 comments)
18. RepoRoulette: Randomly sample repositories from GitHub (5 points | discuss)
19. The Windows Subsystem for Linux is now open source (1453 points | 991 comments)
20. I got fooled by AI-for-science hype–here's what it taught me (260 points | 200 comments)
21. What are people doing? Live-ish estimates based on global population dynamics (217 points | 80 comments)
22. Claude Code SDK (408 points | 176 comments)
23. Biff – a batteries-included web framework for Clojure (79 points | 20 comments)
24. Launch HN: Better Auth (YC X25) – Authentication Framework for TypeScript (231 points | 86 comments)
25. Kilo: A text editor in less than 1000 LOC with syntax highlight and search (191 points | 43 comments)
26. The behavior of LLMs in hiring decisions: Systemic biases in candidate selection (154 points | 124 comments)
27. Game theory illustrated by an animated cartoon game (367 points | 58 comments)
28. Reports of Deno's Demise Have Been Greatly Exaggerated (119 points | 117 comments)
29. Linguists Find Proof of Sweeping Language Pattern Once Deemed a 'Hoax' (29 points | 20 comments)
30. Questioning Representational Optimism in Deep Learning (33 points | 2 comments)
